comments.body: Seems it can be inlined later? The same for below.
This one has a special interaction with null safety that requires it to be inlined in typer. It would be much better to inline after typer.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@
  transparent inline def assert(inline assertion: Boolean, inline message: => Any): Unit =
    if !assertion then scala.runtime.Scala3RunTime.assertFailed(message)

  transparent inline def assert(inline assertion: Boolean): Unit =
